" "Sri Krishna Kripasri Murthy
" "Srila Abhaycharanarabinda Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada
" "Blessings
" "Sri Srimat Jayapataka Swami By Guru Maharaj's Instruction Srimat Gaurangprem Swami Edited by Maharaj.

 not available at this moment Result Not Found Maṅgalācaraṇa "Maṅgala ārati " "Darśana ārati " Gurupūjā "Bhōga ārati " "Sandhyā ārati " "Dāmōdara ārati " "Prasāda sēbānārarambhē "
Maṅgalācaraṇa " bandēhaṁ śrīgurōḥ śrīyuta padakamalaṁ śrīguruna baiṣṇabānśca śrīrūpaṁ sāgajātaṁ sahagaṇa-raghunāthānbitaṁ taṁ sajībam
" "sādbaitaṁ sābadhr̥taṁ parijanasahitaṁ kr̥ṣṇacaitan'ya-dēbaṁ śrīrādhā-kr̥ṣṇapādāna sahagaṇa-lalitā-strībiśākhānbitānśca

" "Śrīguru praṇāma"
"Ajñāna-timirāndhasya jñānāñjana śalākaẏā
" "cakṣurunmīlitaṁ yēna tasmai śrīgurabē namaḥ."
"Śrīla prabhupāda praṇati"
"Namō ōbiṣṇupadagā kr̥ṣṇaprēṣṭāẏa bhūtalē.
" "śrīmatē bhaktibēdānta sbāmīni nāmē.
" "namastē sarasbatī pracāraṇā gauraba dēbē.
" "mukta nihilisṭa paścima tāra pathē.
"।
"Śrīla bhaktisid'dhānta sarasbatī ṭhākura praṇati
"
"Namō ōm̐ biṣṇupādāẏa kr̥ṣṇaprēṣṭhāẏa bhūtalē
" "śrīmatē bhaktisid'dhānta sarasbatīti nāminē
" "śrībāryabhānabīdēbī-daẏitāẏa kr̥pāraūẏē.
" "kr̥ṣṇasambandha-bijñānadāẏinē prabhabē namaḥ.
" "mādhuryōjbala-prēmāḍhya śrīrūpānugabhaktida śrīgaurakaruṇāśakti-bigrahāẏa namōhasta tē
" "namastē gaurabāṇī-śrīmr̥taẏē dīnatāriṇē.
" "śrīrūpānugabirud'dhāpa sid'dhānta phyāstahāriṇē 

"
""Śrīla-gaurakiśōra dāsa bābājī praṇati
"
" Namō gaurakiśōrāẏa sākṣaṇadabairāgāmutaẏē.
" "biprala'ōrasāstōdhē pādāmbujāẏa tē namaḥ.

"
"Śrīla bhaktibinōda ṭhākura praṇati
"
"Namō bhaktibinōdāẏa saccidānanda nāminē. Gauraśaktisbarūpāẏa rūpānugabarāẏa tē.

"
"Śrīla jagannātha dāsa bābājī praṇati
"
"Śrīgaurābirbhābabhūmēstbaṁ nirdēṣṭā sam'māna priẏaḥ |
" "baiṣṇaba-sārbbabhauma śrījagathāẏa tē namaḥ.

"
"Śrī baiṣṇaba-praṇāma
"
"Śrīgaurāṅga praṇāma
"
"Bāñchākalpatarubhyaśca kr̥pāsindhubhya ēba ca. 
" "patitānāṁ pābanēbhyō baiṣṇabēbhyō namō namaḥ

"
"Namō mahābadān'yāẏa kr̥ṣṇaprēma-pradāẏa tē.
" "kr̥ṣṇāẏa kr̥ṣṇacaitan'ya nāmē gauratbiṣē namaḥ.

"
"Pañcatattba praṇāma
"
"Pañcatattbātmakaṁ kr̥ṣṇaṁ bhaktarūpambarūpakam.
" "bhaktābatāraṁ bhaktākhyaṁ namāmi bhaktaśaktikam.

"
"Śrīkr̥ṣṇa praṇāma
"
"Hē kr̥ṣṇa karuṇāsindhō dīnabandhō jagaṯpatē.
" "Gōpēśa gōpikākānta rādhākānta namōhastu tē.

"
"Śrīrādhāra praṇāma 
" "Tapta kāñcana-gaurāṅgī rādhē br̥ndābanēśbarī. 
" "br̥ṣabhānusutē dēbī praṇamāmi haripriẏē

"
"Sambandhādhidēba praṇāma
"
"Jaẏatāṁ suratau palōmama manda matēgatī.
" "maṯsabarṣa padāstōjau rādhā-madanamōhanau

"
"Abhidhēẏādhidēba praṇāma
"
"Dībāda-br̥ndāraṇya-kalpadrumādhaḥ
" "śrīmadūratnāgāra sinhāsanathau
" "śrīśrīrādhā-śrīla gōbindadēbau
" "prēṣṭhālībhiḥ sēbyamānau smarāmi.
"
"Praẏōjanādhidēba praṇāma
"
"Śrīmāna rāsa-rasārajī banśībaṭa-taṭasthitaḥ.
 " "karṣana bēṇu-sbanaigōpīgōpīnāthaḥ śriẏē nā ।।
 
"
"Pañcatattba mahāmantra
"
"(Jaẏa) śrīkr̥ṣṇacaitan'ya prabhu nityānanda.
 " "śrī'adbaita gadādhara śrībāsādi gaurabhaktabr̥nda

"
"Harē kr̥ṣṇa mahāmantra
"
"Harē kr̥ṣṇa harē kr̥ṣṇa kr̥ṣṇa kr̥ṣṇa harē harē.
 " "harē rāma harē rāma rāma rāma harē harē."
"Śrīśrī gurbāṣṭakama
"
"Sansāra-dābānala-līṛha lōka trāṇāẏa kāruṇyaghanāghanatbam.
" "prāptasya kalyāṇa-guṇārṇabasya bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindam 1
" " mahāprabhōḥ kīrtana-nr̥tya-gīta bāditramādyanmanasō rasēna.
" "rōmāñca kampāśru-taraṅgabhājō bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindam 2
" "śrībigrahārādhana-nitya-nānā śr̥ṅgāra-tanmandira mārjanādau.
" "yuktasya bhaktānśca niyuñjatō̕pi bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindam 3
" "caturbidha śrībhagabaṯprasāda sbādbannatr̥ptān haribhaktasaṅghān.
" "kbatbaiba tr̥ptiṁ bhajataḥ sadaiba bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindam 4
" "śrīrādhikāmādhabaẏōrapāra mādhuryalīlā guṇa-rūpa-nānaām.
" "pratikṣaṇāsbādana-lōlupasya bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindam. 5
" "nikuñjayunō ratikēlisid'dhyai yā yālibhiyuktirapēkṣaṇīẏā.
" "tatrātidākṣādatiballabhasya bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindam 6
" "sākṣād'dharitbēna samastaśāstraai ruktastathā bhābyata ēba sadbhiḥ kintu prabhōryaḥ priẏa ēba tasya bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindama 7
" "yasya prasādābhagabaṯ-prasādō yasyāprasādānna gatiḥ kutō̕pi
" "dhyāẏanstabanstasya yaśastrī-sandhyaṁ bandē gurōḥ śrīcaraṇārabindama 8
" "—śrīla biśbanātha cakrabartī ṭhākura

"
"Śrīla prabhupāda praṇati
"
"Namō ōm̐biṣṇupādāga kr̥ṣṇapraēṣṭhāẏā bhūtalē.
" "śrīmatē bhaktibēdānta sbāmīniti nāminē
" "namastē sārasbatē dēbē gaurabāṇī pracāriṇē.
" "nirbiśēṣa śūn'yabādī pāścātyadēśa tāriṇē..

"
"Pañcatattba mahāmantra
"
"(Jaẏa) śrīkr̥ṣṇacaitan'ya prabhu nityānanda.
" "śrī'adbaita gadādhara śrībāsādi gaurabhaktabr̥nda

"
"Harē kr̥ṣṇa mahāmantra
" "Harē kr̥ṣṇa harē kr̥ṣṇa kr̥ṣṇa kr̥ṣṇa harē harē.
 " "harē rāma harē rāma rāma rāma harē harē." "Śrīnr̥sinhadēbēra staba ō praṇāma
"
"Namastē narasinhāẏa prahlādāhlāda-dārinē|
" "hiraṇyakaśipōrbakṣaḥ śilāṭaṅka-nakhālaẏē
" "itō nr̥sinhaḥ paratō nr̥sinhō.
" "yatō yatō yāmi tatō nr̥sinhaḥ
" "bar'hinr̥sinhō hr̥daẏē nr̥sinhō.
" "nr̥sinhamādiṁ śaraṇaṁ prapadyē
" "taba karakamalabarē nakhamadbhutaśr̥ṅgaṁ dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhūṅgam 
" "kēśaba dhr̥ta-naraharirūpa jaẏa jagadīśa harē.
"
"Tulasī sēbā
"
"Śrītulasī ārati kīrttana
" "namō namaḥ tulasī! Kr̥ṣṇaprēẏasī! Rādhākr̥ṣṇa-sēbā pāba ē'i abhilāṣī
" "yē tōmāra śaraṇa laẏa, tāra bāñchā pūrṇa haẏa, kr̥pā kari kara tārē br̥ndābana bāsī.
" "mōra ē'i abhilāṣa, bilāṣa-kuñjē di'ō bāsa, naẏanē hēriba sadā yugalarūparāśi 
" "ē'i nibēdana dhara, sakhīra anugata kara, sēbā-adhikāra diẏē kara nija dāsī.
" "dīna kr̥ṣṇadāsē kaẏa, ē'i yēna mōra haẏa, śrīrādhāgōbinda-prēmē sadā yēna bhāsi"

"
"Śrīnr̥sinhadēbēra staba
"
"Jaẏa nr̥sinha śraī nr̥sinha.
" "jaẏa jaẏa jaẏa śrīnr̥sinha.
" "ugraṁ bīraṁ mahābiṣṇuṁ jbalantaṁ sarbatōmukham.
" "nr̥sinhaṁ bhīṣaṇaṁ bhadraṁ mr̥tyōmr̥tyuṁ namāmyaham
" "śrīnr̥sinha jaẏa nr̥sinha jaẏa jaẏa nr̥sinha.
" "prahlādēśa jaẏapadmamukha padmabhr̥ṅgaṁ
" "taba karakamalabarē nakhamadbhutaśr̥ṅgaṁ dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhūṅgam.
" "kēśaba dhr̥ta-naraharirūpa jaẏa jagadīśa harē.

"
"śrīśrīpañcatatba darśana
"
"Śrīkr̥ṣṇacaitan'ya prabhu daẏā kara mōrē. Tōmā binā kē daẏālu jagaṯ-sansārē
" "patitapābana hētu taba abatāra.
" "mō sama patita prabhu nā pā'ibē āra
" "hā hā prabhu nityānanda! Prēmānanda sukhī
" "kr̥pābalōkana kara āmi baṛa duḥkhī
" "daẏā kara sītāpati adbaita gōsāñi
" "taba kr̥pābalē pā'i caitan'ya-nitā'i
" "hā-hā sbarūpa, sanātana, rūpa, raghunātha.
" "bhaṭṭayuga, śrījība, hā prabhu lōkanātha.
" "daẏā kara śrī ācārya prabhu śrīnibāsa.
" "rāmacandrasaṅga māgē narōttama dāsa.

"
"Śrīśrīrādhāmādhaba darśana
"
"Gōbindamādipuruṣaṁ tamahaṁ bhajāmi (tinabāra)
" "bēṇuṁ kbaṇattamarabindadalāẏatākṣaṁ bahābatansamasitāmbudasundarāṅgam.
" "kandarpakōṭikamanīẏabiśēṣaśōbhaṁ gōbindamādipuruṣaṁ tamahaṁ bhajāmi
" "Aṅgāni yasya sakalēndriẏabr̥ttimatti
" "paśyanti pānti kalaẏasti ciraṁ jaganti.
" "Ānanda cinmaẏa sadujjbala bigrahasya
" "
Gōbindamādipuruṣaṁ tamahaṁ bhajāmi 
" "(śrīśrī brahmasanhitā ślōka 30, 32)

"
"Śrīguru bandanā
"
"Śrīgurucaraṇapanna kēbala bhakati sam'ma, bandō muñi sābadhāna matē.
" "yām̐hāra prasādē bhā'i, ē bhaba tariẏā yā'i, kr̥ṣṇa-prāpti haẏa yām̐hā ha'tē.
" "ō-mukhapadma-bākya cittētē kariẏā aikya, āra nā kariha manē āśā śrīguru-caraṇē rati, ē'i sē uttama-gati, yē prasādē purē sarba āśā
" "cakṣu-dāna dila yē'i, janmē janmē prabhu sē'i, dibyajñāna hr̥dē prakāśita
" "praēma-bhakti yām̐hā haitē, abidyā-bināśa yātē, bēdē gāẏa yām̐hāra carita.
" "śrīguru karuṇā-sindhu, adhama-janāra bandhu, lōkanātha lōkēra jībana. Hā hā prabhu kara daẏā dēha mōrē padachāẏā, ēbē yaśa ghuyuka tribhubana

"
"Bhōga ārati
"
"Bhaja bhakatabaṯsala śrīgaurahari.
" "śrīgaurahari sōhi gōṣṭhabihārī, nanda-yaśōmatī-cittahāri.1.
" "bēlā halō dāmōdara, ā'isa ēkhana.
" "bhōga-mandirē basi’ karaha bhōjana 2
" "nandēra ni-dēśē baisē giribaradhārī.
" "baladēba-saha sakhā baisē sāri sāri.3.
" "śukatā-śākādi bhāji nālitā kuṣmāṇḍa.
" "ḍāli ḍālanā dugdhatumbī dadhi mōcākhaṇḍa. 4.
" "mugabaṛā māṣabaṛā rōṭikā ghr̥tānna.
" "śaṅkulī piṣṭaka kṣīra pulī pāẏasānna.5
" "karpūra amr̥takēlī rambhā kṣīrasāra.
" "amr̥ta rasālā, amla dbādaśa prakāra 6
" "luci cini sarapurī lāḍḍu rasābalī.
" "bhōjana karēna śrīkr̥ṣṇa ha’ẏē kutūhalī.7.
" "rādhikāra pakka anna bibidha byañjana.
" "parama ānandē kr̥ṣṇa karēna bhōjana.8.
" "chalē-balē lāḍḍu khāẏa śrīmadhumaṅgala.
" "bagala bājāẏa, āra dēẏa haribōla.9.
" "rādhikādi gaṇē hēri’ naẏanēra kōṇē.
" "tr̥pta ha’ẏē khāẏa kr̥ṣṇa yaśōdā-bhabanē 10
" "bhōjanāntē piẏē kr̥ṣṇa subāsita bāri.
" "sabē mukha prakṣālaẏa ha’ẏē sāri sāri 11
" "hasta-mukha prakṣāliẏā yata sakhāgaṇē.
" "ānandē biśrāma karē baladēba sanē 12
" "jambula rasāla ānē tāmbula masālā.
" "tāhā khēẏē kr̥ṣṇacandra sukhē nidrā gēlā 13
" "biśālākṣa śikhi-puccha cāmara ḍhulāẏa.
" "apūrba śayyāẏa kr̥ṣṇa sukhē nidrā yāẏa 14.
" "yaśōmatī-ājñā pēẏē dhaniṣṭhā-ānīta.
" "śrīkr̥ṣṇaprasāda rādhā bhūñjē ha’ẏē praīta.15.
" "lalitādi sakhīgaṇa abaśēṣa pāẏa.
" "manē manē sukhē rādhā-kr̥ṣṇaguṇa gāẏa 16
" "hari-līlā ēkamātra yām̐hāra pramōda |
" "bhōgārati gāẏa sē'i bhakatibinōda 17

"
"Śrīnāma-kīrtana
"
"1
" "jaẏa jaẏa gōbinda gōbinda gōpāla, girīdhārī gōpī-nātha nanda-dulāla. Jaẏa jaẏa gōbinda gōbinda gōpāla nanda-dulāla kr̥ṣṇa yaśōdā-dulāla. Jaẏa jaẏa gōbinda gōbinda gōpāla girī-dhārī gōpī-nātha yaśōdā-dulāla, yaśōdā-dulāla kr̥ṣṇa śacīra-dulāla. Jaẏa jaẏa gōbinda gōbinda gōpāla girī-dhārī gōpī-nātha śacīra-dulāla, śacīra-dulāla jaẏa gaura gōpāla jaẏa jaẏa gōbinda gōbinda gōpāla 
" "2
" "yaśōmati-nandana,brajabara-nāgara, gōkularañjana kāna gōpī-parāṇa-dhana, madana-manōhara, kāliẏadamana bidhāna 1
" "amala harināma amiẏa-bilāsā bipina-purandara, nabīna nāgarabara, banśībadana subāsā 2
" "brajajana-pālana, asurakula-nāśana, nanda-gōdhana-rākha'ōẏālā gōbinda mādhaba, nabanīta-taskara, sundara nandagōpālā.3.
" "yāmunataṭacara, gōpī-basanahara, rāsa-rasika, kr̥pāmaẏa. Śrīrādhāballabha, br̥ndābana naṭabara, bhakatibinōda āśraẏa.4.

"
"Tulasī sēbā
" "śrītulasī ārati kīrttana
"
"Namō namaḥ tulasī! Kr̥ṣṇaprēẏasī! Rādhākr̥ṣṇa-sēbā pāba ē'i abhilāṣī
" "yē tōmāra śaraṇa laẏa, tāra bāñchā pūrṇa haẏa, kr̥pā kari kara tārē br̥ndābana bāsī.
" "mōra ē'i abhilāṣa, bilāṣa-kuñjē di'ō bāsa, naẏanē hēriba sadā yugalarūparāśi..
" "ē'i nibēdana dhara, sakhīra anugata kara, sēbā-adhikāra diẏē kara nija dāsī.
" "dīna kr̥ṣṇadāsē kaẏa, ē'i yēna mōra haẏa, śrīrādhāgōbinda-prēmē sadā yēna bhāsi

"
"Śrīśrīgaura-ārati
"
"Jaẏa jaẏa gōrācam̐ādēra āratikō śōbhā.
" "jāhnabī-taṭabanē jagamanōlōbhā 1
" "dakṣiṇē nitā'icam̐āda, bāmē gadādhara.
" "nikaṭē adbaita, śrīnibāsa chatradhara 2\N n" "basiẏāchē gōrācam̐āda ratnasinhāsanē.
" "ārati karēna brahmā-ādi dēbagaṇē 3
" "narahari-ādi kari’ cāmara ḍhulāẏa.
" "sañjaẏa-mukunda-bāsughōṣa-ādi gāẏa 4
" "śaṅkha bājē, ghanṭā bājē, bājē karatāla.
" "madhura mr̥daṅga bājē parama rasāla 5
" "bahukōṭi candra jini’ badana ujjbala.
" "galadēśē banamālā karē jhalamala 6
" "śiba-śuka-nārada prēmē gadagada 
" "bhakatibinōda dēkhē gōrāra sampada 7
"
""Śrīnr̥sinhadēbēra staba ō praṇāma
"
"Namastē narasinhāẏa prahlādāhlāda-dāẏinē.
" "hiraṇyakaśipōrbakṣaḥ śilāṭaṅka-nakhālaẏē
" "itō nr̥sinhaḥ paratō nr̥sinhō yatō yatō yāmi tatō nr̥sinhaḥ
" "bar'hinr̥sinhō hr̥daẏē nr̥sinhō. Nr̥sinhamādiṁ śaraṇaṁ prapadyē
" "taba karakamalabarē nakhamadbhutaśr̥ṅgaṁ dalitahiraṇyakaśiputanubhūṅgam.
" "kēśaba dhr̥ta-naraharirūpa jaẏa jagadīśa harē

"
"Śrīdāmōdarāṣṭakam
"
"Namāmīśbaraṁ saccidānandarūpaṁ lasaṯ-kuṇḍalaṁ gōkulē bhraājamānam.
" "yaśōdābhiẏōlūkhalābdhābamānaṁ parāmr̥ṣṭamatyaṁ tatō drutya gōpyā 1
" "rudattaṁ muhurnētrayugmaṁ mr̥jantaṁ karābhōjayugmēna sātaṅkanētram.
" "muhuḥśbāsakampa trirēkhāṅkakaṇṭha sthita-graiba-dāmōdaraṁ bhuktibad'dham 2
" "itīdr̥k sbalīlābhirānandakuṇḍē sbaghōṣaṁ nimajjantamākhyāpaẏantam.
" "tadīẏēśitajñēṣu bhaktairjitatbaṁ punaḥ prēmatastaṁ śatābr̥tti bandē 3
 " "baraṁ dēba! Mōkṣanna mōkṣābadhiṁ bā na cān'yaṁ br̥ṇē̕haṁ barēśādapīha idattē bapu nātha gōpālabālaṁ sadā mē manasyābirāstāṁ kiman'yaiḥ.4.
" "idantē mukhāmbhōjamabyaktanīlai br̥taṁ kumbhalaiḥ snigdha-raktaiśca gōpyā.
" "muhuścambitaṁ bimba-raktādharaṁ mē manasyābirāstāmalaṁ lakṣalābhaiḥ 5
" "namō dēba! Dāmōdaranasta! Biṣṇō! Prasīda prabhō duḥkhajālākkimagnam.
" "kr̥pādr̥ṣṭi-br̥ṣṭyātidīnaṁ batānu gr̥hāṇēśa! Mārmajñamēdhyakṣi dr̥śyaḥ 6 
" "kubērātmajau bad'dhamūrtyaiba yadbaṯ tbaẏā mōcitau bhaktibhājau kr̥tau tathā prēmabhaktiṁ sbakāṁ mē prayaccha namōkṣē grahōmē̕sti dāmōdaraēha 7
" "namastē̕stu dāmnē sphuraddīpti-dhāmnē tbadīẏōdarāẏātha biśbasya dhāmnē.V "namō rādhikāẏai tbadīẏa-priẏāẏai namōnanta-līlāẏa dēbāẏa tubhyam 8
"
"Gōsbāmī gaṇēra bigrahadēra nāmasmaraṇa
"
"(1)
" "jaẏa rādhā mādhaba rādhā mādhaba rādhē jaẏadēbēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(2)
" "jaẏa rādhā-dāmōdara rādhā-dāmōdara rādhē jība gōsbāmīra prāṇadhana hē
" "(3)
" "jaẏa rādhā-madanamōhana rādhā-madanamōhana rādhē sanātanēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(8 )
" "jaẏa rādhā-gōbinda rādhā-gōbinda rādhē rūpa gōsbāmīra prāṇadhana hē
" "(5)
" "jaẏa rādhā-gōpīnātha rādhā-gōpīnātha rādhē madhu paṇḍitēra prāṇadhana hē jaẏa rādhā-madanagōpāla rādhā madanagōpala rādhē sītānāthēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(7)
" "jaẏa rādhā-ramaṇa rādhā-ramaṇa rādhē gōpāla bhaṭṭēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(8)
" "jaẏa rādhā-binōda rādhā-binōda rādhē lōkanāthēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(9)
" "jaẏa rādhā-gōkulānanda rādhā-gōkulānda rādhē biśbanāthēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(10)
" "jaẏa rādhā-giridhārī rādhā-giridhārī rādhē dāsa gōsbāmīra prāṇadhana hē
" "(11)
" "jaẏa rādhā-śyāmasundara rādhā-śyāmasundara rādhē śyāmānandēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(12)
" "jaẏa rādhā-bandhubihārī rādhā-bandhubihārī rādhē haridāsēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(13)
" "jaẏa rādhā-kānta rādhā-kānta rādhē bakrēśbarēra prāṇadhana hē
" "(14)
" "jaẏa gāndhārbikā-giridhārī gāndhārbikā-giridhārī rādhē sarasbatīra prāṇadhana hē
" "(15)
" "jaẏa rādhā mādhaba rādhā mādhaba rādhē śrīla prabhupādēra prāṇadhana hē

"
"Prasāda-sēbanārambhē
" "Mahāprasādē gōbindē, nāma-brahmaṇi baiṣṇabē
" "sbalpa-puṇya batāṁ rājana biśbāsa naiba jāẏatē
" "śarīra abidyā-jāla jaṛēndriẏa tāhē kāla
" "jībē phēlē biṣaẏa-sāgarē.
" "tā’ra madhyē jihbā ati, lōbhamaẏa sudurmati,
" "tā’kē jētā kaṭhina sansārē
" "kr̥ṣṇa baṛa daẏāmaẏa,karibārē jihbā jaẏa,
" "sbaprasāda-anna dilā bhā'i.
" "sē'i annāmr̥ta pā'ō rādhākr̥ṣṇa guṇa gā'ō, prēmē ḍāka caitan'ya nitā'i

"
"Cētōdarpaṇamārjanaṁ bhabamahādābāgni-nirbāpaṇaṁ
" "śrēẏaḥkairabacandrikābitaraṇaṁ bidyābadhūjībanam.
" "ānandāmbudhibardhanaṁ pratipadaṁ pūrṇāmr̥tāsbādanaṁ
" "arvatmannapanang Parang Bijayate Shri Krišna Kirtan .1

"
"Nānnāmakāri bahudhā nijasarbaśakti-
" "statrārpitā niẏamitaḥ smaraṇē na kālaḥ .
" "ētādr̥śī taba kr̥pā bhagabanmamāpi
" "durdaibamīdr̥śamihājani nānurāgaḥ. 2

" "Tr̥ṇādapi sunīcēna tarōrapi sahiṣṇuṇā.
" "amāninā mānadēna kīrtanīẏaḥ sadā hariḥ .3.
 
" "Na dhanaṁ na janaṁ na sundarīṁ kabitāṁ
" "bā jagadīśa kāmaẏē
" "mama janmani janmanīśbarē
" "bhabatādbhaktirahaitukī tbaẏi 4

" "Aẏi nanda tanuja kiṅkara
" "patitaṁ māṁ biṣamē bhabāmbudhau.
" "kr̥paẏā taba pādapaṅkaja
" "Sthitadhūlī sadr̥śaṁ chinta 5

" "Naẏanaṁ galadaśrudhāraẏā badanaṁ gadzwnjgadarud'dhaẏā girā.
" "pulakairnicitaṁ bapuḥ kadā taba nāmagrahaṇē bhabiṣyati 6

" "Yugāẏitaṁ nimēṣēṇa cakṣuṣā prābr̥ṣāẏitam.
" "śūn'yāẏitaṁ jagaṯ sarbaṁ gōbindabirahēṇa mē .7.
 
" "Āśiṣya bā pādaratāṁ pinaṣṭu mā
" "madarśanānmarmahatāṁ karōtu bā.
" "yathā tathā bā bidadhātu lampaṭō
" "maṯprāṇanāthastu sa ēba nāparaḥ 8
